titles.title: A resolution extending the provisions of Senate Resolution 106 of the One Hundred First Congress (agreed to April 13, 1989).

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/26/1993--Introduced. Refers S. 740 (a bill for the relief of a named corporation and two named individuals) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
